entry.title: First item
entry.content:
Each Atom entry will have title |nodename|.

Node pubDate is parsed from first link found in node. It has to be in RFC3339 format! Format is very simple: YYYY-mm-ddTHH:MM:SS+timezone. URL of link is taken as entry url.

Everything else is considered as content of Atom entry.

Well, and that's all. Simple, isn't it?
